dns.title: DNS Records
dns.description: Query all DNS records for the domain, including A, AAAA, MX, TXT, NS, CNAME and other record types
dns.searchPlaceholder: Enter domain to view all its DNS records, including A, MX, TXT, CNAME and other types

dnsBasics.dnsDescription: DNS (Domain Name System) translates human-readable domain names to computer-understandable IP addresses, a crucial internet infrastructure.
dnsBasics.ttlDescription: TTL (Time To Live) indicates how long DNS records can be cached, shorter TTL means faster update propagation.

screenshot.title: Website Screenshot
screenshot.description: Capture website screenshots on different devices, supporting desktop, mobile and tablet views
screenshot.desktopDesc: Simulates Chrome browser display at 1920×1080 resolution
screenshot.mobileDesc: Simulates iPhone device display at 375×667 resolution
screenshot.tabletDesc: Simulates iPad device display at 768×1024 resolution
screenshot.inputDomain: Enter website domain to capture screenshots on different devices

features.multiDeviceDesc: Supports desktop, mobile, and tablet views to comprehensively understand website display across different devices.
features.highQualityDesc: Uses advanced headless browser technology to ensure screenshot accuracy and quality, truly reflecting website appearance.
features.easyDownloadDesc: Supports one-click screenshot downloads, convenient for saving and sharing, suitable for design reference and competitive analysis.

healthCheckDetails: • Health checks are performed every 30 seconds
• Service status automatically updates in real-time
• Response times are averaged over the last 5 minutes
• Uptime percentages calculated over the last 30 days
